pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helper Functions for Bayesian Analyses // Functions to 'numericise' 'R' objects (coerce to numeric objects), summarise 'MCMC' (Monte Carlo Markov Chain) samples and calculate deviance residuals as well as 'R' translations of some 'BUGS' (Bayesian Using Gibbs Sampling), 'JAGS' (Just Another Gibbs Sampler), 'STAN' and 'TMB' (Template Model Builder) functions.
